************************ Template *********************************************************
MULTI:		//to be used when an enhancement has multiple choices, name of the multi selector.
MSLOT:		//the slot in the multiselection window that this enhancement resides in.
NAME: 		**(Required) Name of Enhancement
TREE: 		**(Required) Name of Tree that this enhancement belongs too
LEVEL: 		**(Required) What level of the tree is the enhancement in (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5)
SLOT: 		**(Required) What column the enhancement is in (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5)
RANKS:		**(Required) Number for ranks this enhancement can have. (1, 2, 3)
TYPE:		**(Required) is this enhancement an Active or Passive one.	
COST:		**(Required) how many action points does it cost to select this enhancement and its ranks
DESC1: 		//Description of enhancements rank 1
REQ1:		//A list of Requirements to be able to select this enhancement.
REQONE1:	//A list of Requirements where at least one is needed to select this enhancement
LOCK1:		//A list of enhancements that can lock this enhancement from being taken.
MOD1:		//A list of what is modified by this enhancement if passive. Each Value needs its own type. ie Spot and Search would be MOD1: Skill, Skill 
		Possible Mod types are (Ability, Skill, Save, Attribute)
MODNAME1:	//Name of specific Mod being modified one for each MOD above.  Possible values
		Ability:
			Hit Points
			Spell Points
			Spellcraft
		
		Save:
			Fortitude
			Reflex
			Will
	
		Skill:
			Balance
			Bluff
			Concentration
			Diplomacy
			Disable Device
			Haggle
			Heal
			Hide
			Intimidate
			Jump
			Listen
			Move Silently
			Open Lock
			Perform
			Repair
			Search
			Spot
			Swim
			Tumble
			Use Magic Device

		Attribute:
			Charisma
			Constitution
			Dexterity
			Intelligence
			Strength
			Wisdom
		
MODVALUE1:	//What is the Value of the change(a numeric value), one for each MOD.
DESC2: 		//Description of enhancements rank 2
REQ2:
REQONE2:
LOCK2: 
MOD2: 
MODNAME2: 
MODVALUE2:
DESC3: 		//Description of enhancements rank 3
REQ3:
REQONE3:
LOCK3:
MOD3:
MODNAME3:0
MODVALUE3:
ICON:		**(Required) Name of the icon file that represents this enhancement, use NoImage if none available.
****************** End of Template *******************************************************
